mapper.insert:
insert into t_own_vehicle_certificate (own_vehicle_id, group_name, certificate_type,certificate_no, process_dt, certificate_validity_begin, certificate_validity_end, certificate_fee, certificate_attachment1, certificate_attachment2, certificate_attachment3, group_remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_date, compnay_id) values
(#{item.ownVehicleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.certificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.processDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.certificateValidityBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.certificateValidityEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.certificateFee,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.certificateAttachment1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateAttachment2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateAttachment3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{item.updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.compnayId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update: update t_own_vehicle_certificate set is_deleted = 1, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where own_vehicle_id = #{ownVehicleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and compnay_id = #{compnayId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
